entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
